TEXT.TITLE: COMSTOCK GROUP <CSTK> SELLS PREFERRED STOCK
TEXT.BODY: Comstock Group Inc said it has signed a letter of intent to sell about 20 mln dlrs of convertible preferred stock to <Spie Batignolles SA> of Paris' Spie Group Inc U.S. subsidiary. Details were not disclosed. Reuter
